ModMetaData.name: Dragon Ball Z: Rimworld Adventures - Revived!
ModMetaData.author: Ace Raider, Zero-Exodus, Meng De
ModMetaData.description:
Made by Ace Raider and Zero-Exodus
"Many Thanks to Jecrell, Erd Elf, Mehni, DrunkenFlake and ChJees for helping with fixing this mod.
Time to find out whether you and your colonists have the strenght and courage to stand up to the amazing task of becoming the new Z fighters, in a galaxy, far, far away.
The Following is a fan-based mod. DragonBall, DragonBall Z, DragonBall GT, and DragonBall Super are all owned by Funimation, Toei Animation, Shueisha, Bandai Namco Entertainment, and Akira Toriyama. Please support the official release."
(Updated to 1.0+ by Meng De)
